Class Connect4Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • Connect4Controller

  • public class Connect4Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is made as the controller of the connect 4 game. And there are the human and ai player in the game.
    Version:
    v1
    Author:
    project5 group
    See Also:
    Application
